statements: SELECT * FROM variant_data;
SELECT variant_name, gene_name, chromosome FROM variant_data WHERE allele_freq > 0.5;
SELECT variant_id, variant_name, gene_name FROM variant_data ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM variant_data WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND position > 10000;
SELECT COUNT(variant_id) AS total_variants FROM variant_data;
SELECT * FROM variant_data WHERE allele_freq > 0.5 ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT variant_name, gene_name, chromosome, allele_freq FROM variant_data WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT * FROM variant_data WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND allele_freq BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY allele_freq ASC;
SELECT variant_name, position FROM variant_data WHERE gene_name = 'EGFR' AND chromosome = '7';
SELECT variant_id, gene_name FROM variant_data WHERE position < 1000 ORDER BY gene_name ASC, variant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Variants WHERE chromosome_number = 1
SELECT variant_name, position FROM Variants WHERE reference_allele = 'A' AND alternate_allele = 'T'
SELECT disease_name, severity_level FROM Diseases WHERE severity_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM Variants ORDER BY position DESC
SELECT COUNT(id) AS num_variants FROM Variants
SELECT * FROM Variants WHERE chromosome_number = 1
SELECT variant_name, position FROM Variants WHERE position > 1000 ORDER BY position DESC
SELECT id, disease_name, associated_genes FROM Diseases WHERE severity_level = 'High' ORDER BY disease_name
SELECT id, variant_name, chromosome_number, position FROM Variants WHERE reference_allele = 'A' OR alternate_allele = 'G'
SELECT D.disease_name, V.variant_name FROM Diseases D JOIN Variants V ON D.id = V.id WHERE D.severity_level = 'Medium'
SELECT * FROM variants WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA2'
SELECT variant_id, gene_name FROM variants WHERE allele_freq > 0.5
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM predispositions WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT variant_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM predispositions GROUP BY variant_id
SELECT * FROM variants WHERE allele_freq > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_name ASC, variant_type DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT v.gene_name, p.patient_name, pr.risk_level FROM variants v JOIN predispositions pr ON v.variant_id = pr.variant_id JOIN patients p ON pr.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE v.variant_type = 'SNP' AND pr.risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM variants v LEFT JOIN predispositions pr ON v.variant_id = pr.variant_id WHERE pr.patient_id IS NULL;

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) as predisposition_count FROM patients p JOIN predispositions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_id HAVING predisposition_count > 1 ORDER BY predisposition_count DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT disease_name, disease_description FROM DiseaseData WHERE risk_factor = 'High'
SELECT gene_name, variant_type FROM VariantData WHERE variant_location = 'Exon 1'
SELECT * FROM DiseaseVariantMapping WHERE variant_id = 3
SELECT * FROM DiseaseData WHERE disease_name = 'Cancer';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT gene_name, variant_type, variant_location FROM VariantData WHERE variant_type = 'SNP' AND variant_location LIKE '%chr20%';

SELECT DiseaseData.disease_name, COUNT(*) AS variant_count FROM DiseaseData JOIN DiseaseVariantMapping ON DiseaseData.disease_id = DiseaseVariantMapping.disease_id GROUP BY disease_name HAVING variant_count > 3 ORDER BY variant_count DESC;

SELECT PatientData.patient_name, DiseaseData.disease_name FROM PatientData JOIN DiseaseVariantMapping ON PatientData.patient_id = DiseaseVariantMapping.mapping_id JOIN DiseaseData ON DiseaseVariantMapping.disease_id = DiseaseData.disease_id WHERE DiseaseData.risk_factor = 'High';
SELECT * FROM variants WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT disease_name, description FROM diseases WHERE disease_id = 1;
SELECT variant_name, position FROM variants ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT variant_id, variant_name, gene_name, variant_type, chromosome, position FROM variants WHERE variant_type = 'SNV';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT pv.genotype, p.patient_name, v.variant_name FROM patient_variants pv JOIN patients p ON pv.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN variants v ON pv.variant_id = v.variant_id;

SELECT d.disease_name, COUNT(pv.patient_variant_id) AS num_variants FROM diseases d JOIN patient_variants pv ON d.disease_id = pv.variant_id GROUP BY d.disease_name HAVING num_variants > 10 ORDER BY num_variants DESC;
